d.f: ￹￺'to be straight￻一直線，垂直，直線，至頭至尾整條大小一樣

e: ￹`Maredo~ `ko~ `tayal~ `nira~.￺He worked consistently till the work was finished.￻他的工作一貫地直到完成，他的工作徹頭徹尾
￹`Ano~ `maredo~ `iso~ `ko~ `ni~`harateng~`an~ `iso~...￺If you keep a steady course to your decision...￻假使你按你的決斷力去進行……
￹`Rdoen~ `ko~ `olah~ `iso~ `to~ `Kawas~.￺Keep your love for God consistent.￻對上帝的愛堅實不變，願你徹底愛神
d.f: ￹￺consistent￻調和，一致的，並立，首尾一貫的
